intro: I work full-time as a Solution Analyst at Deloitte, modernizing legacy systems to optimize client operations. Aside from that, I spend a considerable amount of my spare time challenging myself with new technologies and expanding my skillset. I enjoy solving difficult problems and strive to make an impact on the world around me.

projects.title: Personal Projects
projects.gameReviewDesc: A group project in creating a platform that users can sign up and leave reviews for video games. We made both a web and native Android application. I contributed by designing and implementing REST APIs, and integrating external APIs to enhance the application's features.
projects.sobelDesc: I participated in a group research project on multithreading edge detection algorithms. I contributed by writing prototypes and researching methods to run the Sobel edge detection algorithm in parallel.
projects.backtesterDesc: An ongoing project on creating a TUI backtesting engine for trading and investing. I have built a prototype of a backtesting engine in Go, and created a duckDB database to store various asset data a user might want to backtest. Currently, I am extending the strategies that a user can run.

skills.title: Skills
skills.javascript: As my primary language at work, I'm very comfortable with JavaScript and have built multiple projects with it.
skills.python: I enjoy using Python for rapid prototyping, studying data structures, and handling various data pre-processing tasks.
skills.linux: I have ~1.5 years of linux experience on server and desktop, I am quite comfortable with the Linux ecosystem and find it enjoyable.
skills.go: I'm currently learning Go by building a backtesting engine and find it to be a very enjoyable and efficient language.
skills.react: I have built projects with both React and React Native and use it frequently in my professional work for UI development.
skills.databases: I have experience working with both SQL and NoSQL databases and have used both types in various personal projects.
